channel.title: explore on Jay Cromwell
channel.description: Recent content in explore on Jay Cromwell

item.title: Budapest, Hungary
item.description: Budapest - February 2019 I could go on and on about Budapest, my favorite city in the world so far, but I’ll try to keep it short-ish. We took the train from Vienna and travelling through the countryside, and well, it is pretty much what you’d imagine the Hungarian countryside to look like. Lots of nothing and the few towns and cities had a prevalent communism influence with un-maintained, large concrete buildings.

item.title: Prague, Czech Republic
item.description: Prague - February 2019 Prague is one of my all time favorite cities. I most recently went in February. While it was freezing, going to Europe in winter did have a couple of perks, the main being few other tourists. I had been to Prague in the Summer and not having to fight for a spot in front of the Clock Tower was nice to say the least. Another great aspect of Europe in Winter was how beautiful Prague is in the snow.
